profile.name: Samuel Colvin
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | @pydantic
profile.summary: Highly motivated developer with a passion for Rust systems programming and Python projects. Proven track record of contributing to open-source projects and delivering high-quality solutions.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Designed and implemented scalable data pipelines using Rust and WebAssembly.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop and deploy machine learning models.
Developed and maintained multiple open-source projects, including datafusion-sql-udfs and rtoml.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed custom Python applications for clients across various industries.
Implemented data validation and error handling using Pydantic and Logfire.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development of datafusion-sql-udfs, a Rust-based SQL UDF library.
Collaborated with other maintainers to resolve issues and improve the overall quality of the project.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed custom Python applications for clients across various industries.
Implemented data validation and error handling using Pydantic.
